languages.text: {n}Андровета-Фи гневно шипит на {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}техна-лингве{/g}, тыкая скрюченным пальцем в Джиневри.{/n} "Я предупреждала, что быть беде! Мирянка заставляла меня истязать духа машины, и он покинул нас, забрав с собой все логи стараний тружеников! Кощунство!"

{n}Fuming, Androveta-Phi hisses something in {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}, pointing a crooked finger at Jinevri.{/n} "I told you! I warned you that it would end this way! The laywoman forced me to mistreat the machine spirit until it left us, taking all the logs of the crew's toils with it! Sacrilege!"
languages.original_text: {n}Андровета-Фи гневно шипит на {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}техна-лингве{/g}, тыкая скрюченным пальцем в Джиневри.{/n} "Я предупреждала, что быть беде! Мирянка заставляла меня истязать духа машины, и он покинул нас, забрав с собой все логи стараний тружеников! Кощунство!"

The laywoman forced me to mistreat the machine spirit until it left us, taking all the logs of the crew's toils with it! Sacrilege!"

The laywoman forced me to mistreat the machine spirit until it left us, taking all the logs of the crew's toils with it! Sacrilege!"

{n}Fuming, Androveta-Phi hisses something in {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}, pointing a crooked finger at Jinevri.{/n} "I told you! I warned you that it would end this way! The laywoman forced me to mistreat the machine spirit until it left us, taking all the logs of the crew's toils with it! Sacrilege!"

languages.text: {n}Outrée, Androveta-Phi crache quelques mots en {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}, tout en braquant un doigt crochu sur Jinevri.{/n} « Je vous l'avais dit ! Je vous avais {mf|prévenu|prévenue} que cela se terminerait ainsi ! La profane m'a obligée à malmener l'esprit de la machine, et voilà qu'il nous a abandonnés en emportant avec lui tous les registres du personnel ! Sacrilège ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Fuming, Androveta-Phi hisses something in {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}, pointing a crooked finger at Jinevri.{/n} "I told you! I warned you that it would end this way! The laywoman forced me to mistreat the machine spirit until it left us, taking all the logs of the crew's toils with it! Sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Outrée, Androveta-Phi crache quelques mots en Techna-Lingua, tout en braquant un doigt crochu sur Jinevra.{/n} « Je vous l'avais dit ! Je vous avais {mf|prévenu|prévenue} que cela se terminerait ainsi ! La profane m'a obligée à malmener l'esprit de la machine, et voilà qu'il nous a abandonnés en emportant avec lui tous les registres du personnel ! Sacrilège ! »

languages.text: {n}Furiosa, Androveta-Fi sisea algo en {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}tecnolingua{/g} y señala a Jinevri con un dedo huesudo.{/n} «¡Se lo dije! ¡Le advertí que esto acabaría así! ¡La laica me ha forzado a maltratar al espíritu máquina hasta que nos ha abandonado, llevándose consigo todos los registros de labores de la tripulación! ¡Sacrilegio!».
languages.original_text: {n}Fuming, Androveta-Phi hisses something in {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}, pointing a crooked finger at Jinevri.{/n} "I told you! I warned you that it would end this way! The laywoman forced me to mistreat the machine spirit until it left us, taking all the logs of the crew's toils with it! Sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Furiosa, Androveta-Phi sisea algo en tecnolingua y señala a Jinevra con un dedo huesudo.{/n} «¡Se lo dije! ¡Le advertí que esto acabaría así! ¡La laica me ha forzado a maltratar al espíritu máquina hasta que nos ha abandonado, llevándose consigo todos los registros de labores de la tripulación! ¡Sacrilegio!».

languages.text: {n}安多维塔-菲气得七窍生烟。她用{g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}科技之语{/g}发出了嘶嘶的声音，伸出弯曲的手指，指着杰尼娃。{/n}“我早就说过！我早就警告过你会发生这种事情！那个教外人士强迫我虐待机魂，现在它已经离开我们了，带着所有的工作日志彻底消失了！何等亵渎！”
languages.original_text: {n}Fuming, Androveta-Phi hisses something in {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}, pointing a crooked finger at Jinevri.{/n} "I told you! I warned you that it would end this way! The laywoman forced me to mistreat the machine spirit until it left us, taking all the logs of the crew's toils with it! Sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}安多维塔-菲气得七窍生烟。她用科技之语发出了嘶嘶的声音，伸出弯曲的手指，指着杰尼娃。{/n}“我早就说过！我早就警告过你会发生这种事情！那个教外人士强迫我虐待机魂，现在它已经离开我们了，带着所有的工作日志彻底消失了！何等亵渎！”

languages.text: {n}激怒したアンドロヴェータ・ファイは、ジネヴリに曲がった指を向けながら、{g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}テクナ・リングア{/g}で何かを叫んだ。{/n}「私の言った通りだ！こうなると警告したはずだ！素人の女は、機械精霊が私たちのもとを去るまで、虐待するよう強要したんだ！冒涜だ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Fuming, Androveta-Phi hisses something in {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}, pointing a crooked finger at Jinevri.{/n} "I told you! I warned you that it would end this way! The laywoman forced me to mistreat the machine spirit until it left us, taking all the logs of the crew's toils with it! Sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}激怒したアンドロヴェータ・ファイは、ジネブラに曲がった指を向けながら、テクナ・リングアで何かを叫んだ。{/n} 「私の言った通りだ！こうなると警告したはずだ！素人の女は、機械精霊が私たちのもとを去るまで、虐待するよう強要したんだ！冒涜だ！」

languages.text: {n}Androveta-Phi zischt zornig etwas in der {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua technis{/g} und deutet mit ihrem krummen Finger auf Jinevri.{/n} "Ich habe es Euch gesagt! Ich habe Euch gewarnt, dass es so enden würde! Die Laiin hat mich gezwungen, den Maschinengeist zu misshandeln, bis er uns verließ. Und er hat sämtliche Logs der Qualen der Crew mitgenommen! Sakrileg!"
languages.original_text: {n}Fuming, Androveta-Phi hisses something in {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}, pointing a crooked finger at Jinevri.{/n} "I told you! I warned you that it would end this way! The laywoman forced me to mistreat the machine spirit until it left us, taking all the logs of the crew's toils with it! Sacrilege!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Androveta-Phi zischt zornig etwas in der Lingua technis und deutet mit ihrem schiefen Finger auf Jinevra.{/n} "Ich habe es Euch gesagt! Ich habe Euch gewarnt, dass es so enden würde! Die Laiin hat mich gezwungen, den Maschinengeist zu misshandeln, bis er uns verlassen hat. Und er hat sämtliche Logs der Qualen der Crew mitgenommen! Sakrileg!"

languages.text: {n}Burnundan soluyan Androveta-Fi, {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua Techna{/g}'da bir şeyler tıslayarak eğri büğrü parmağıyla Jinevri'yi işaret ediyor.{/n} "Sana söylemiştim! Bu şekilde sona ereceğine dair seni uyarmıştım! Avam kadını, beni makine ruhuna kötü muamele etmek zorunda bıraktı! Ardından ruh aramızdan ayrılıp beraberinde mürettebatın tüm çalışma kayıtlarını da götürdü. Hürmetsizlik!"
languages.original_text: {n}Fuming, Androveta-Phi hisses something in {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}, pointing a crooked finger at Jinevri.{/n} "I told you! I warned you that it would end this way! The laywoman forced me to mistreat the machine spirit until it left us, taking all the logs of the crew's toils with it! Sacrilege!"
